mapper.select: select m.gNo, m.gName, m.gIntro, m.gShort, m.gThumbOri, m.gThumbRen, m.gCoverOri, m.gCoverRen, m.gJoinYN, m.gCnt, m.gQ1, m.gQ2, m.gQ3, m.aNo, m.iNo, a.sido, a.gugun, a.emd, a.ri, i.iCont, mm.uNick, mm.uNo from moim m, interest i, area a, (select mg.gNo, u.uNo, u.uNick from myGroup mg, tbl_user u where mg.uNo = u.uNo and mg.lNo=1) mm where m.iNo = i.iNo and m.aNo = a.aNo and mm.gNo = m.gNo and m.gNo = #{gNo}

select mg.uNo, mg.gNo, mg.pNo, mg.lNo, mg.mgCont, u.uNick, u.uRen, floor(months_between(sysdate,uBirth) / 12) as uAge, u.uGender, l.lName, p.pName from myGroup mg join tbl_user u on mg.uNo = u.uNo join memberLv l on mg.lNo = l.lNo left join punishLv p on mg.pNo = p.pNo where mg.gNo = #{gNo}
select count(*) from myGroup mg join tbl_user u on mg.uNo = u.uNo join memberLv l on mg.lNo = l.lNo left join punishLv p on mg.pNo = p.pNo where mg.gNo = #{gNo}

select * from ( select mg.uNo, mg.gNo, mg.pNo, mg.lNo, mg.mgCont, u.uNick, u.uRen, floor(months_between(sysdate,uBirth) / 12) as uAge, u.uGender, l.lName, p.pName, rownum as rNum from myGroup mg join tbl_user u on mg.uNo = u.uNo join memberLv l on mg.lNo = l.lNo left join punishLv p on mg.pNo = p.pNo where mg.gNo = #{gNo} order by u.uNick asc ) where rNum between #{start} and #{end} order by lNo

select mg.uNo, mg.gNo, mg.pNo, mg.lNo, mg.mgCont, u.uNick, u.uRen, floor(months_between(sysdate,uBirth) / 12) as uAge, u.uGender, l.lName, p.pName from myGroup mg join tbl_user u on mg.uNo = u.uNo join memberLv l on mg.lNo = l.lNo left join punishLv p on mg.pNo = p.pNo where u.uNo = #{uNo} and mg.gNo = #{gNo}

select count(*) from myGroup mg, moim g, tbl_user u, interest i, ( select gNo, count(*) as memCnt from myGroup group by gNo ) cnt where g.gNo = mg.gNo and g.iNo = i.iNo and mg.uNo = u.uNo and lNo = 1 and cnt.gNo = g.gNo and g.aNo in ( select aNo from area where gugun = ( select a.gugun from area a, tbl_user u where u.aNo=a.aNo and u.uNo=#{uNo} ) ) and g.gNo not in ( select gNo from myGroup where uNo = #{uNo} )
and g.iNo in ( select iNo from user_interest where uNo = #{uNo} )
and i.iNo = #{iNo}
and g.gName like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
